main event: A luminous object was observed in Russia on 20 February 1953, appearing to be glowing with a trail and descending.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 20 seconds., The object was seen moving south., The object appeared dark in color., Previous sightings in the area included unusual optical phenomena observed from November 1952 to February 1953., ATIC comments suggested many sightings were possibly due to Soviet balloon activity.
